title: How is Wukong not an "aggressive diver"
body: Thats literally all he does lol

replies.body:
I think it's because he's more of a kite diver

players love to play tricks with him and unlike most characters, he doesn't have to stick to his target to do damage, hence their little helicopter dances

> kite diver

so now we have "kite diver" and "dive initiator"

Any other completely made up 'classes' people want to throw in?
He's a swimming diver anti-diving dive champion
Did you mean {{champion:111}} ?
crit poker{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
{{champion:41}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ghostcrawler,realm=NA,timestamp=2017-01-13T01:01:32.401+0000)
>
> Blitzcrank: Grabber

[(source)](http://askghostcrawler.tumblr.com/post/155820269263/could-you-talk-about-the-6-unique-playstyle)

how do you dive and kite at the same time? That's...keeping distance while removing distance... You know he dives the guy that does the kiting right? Do you mean he dives into pools while flying kites? Does he dive into kites? is he a kite that dives? idk
keeping distance while maintaining distance is the same thing. Closing distance while maintaining distance is what you were going for, I think.
I think its because hes not a squishy assassin, and more of a dive initiator

> dive initiator

Lol what? Thats legit just confirming that hes a diver
He's too tanky to be in it.
Wukong isnt a tank
He may not be a tank but his passive literally gives him resistances based on how many people he is fighting.  He's too tanky to be fair there.
And thats worse than the champs with sustain and shields built in how?
How many of those are in the bloodmoon hunt?

{{champion:103}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:157}}

Thats just about half

{{champion:164}} 
You forgot her. :^) And she even has a shield and sustain at the same time.
{{champion:121}} and {{champion:28}} have shields or sustain?
They do, actually. Kha'zix gets a heal with his w if he's in the explosion, and eve gets a shield from her ult.
Ahh.  Good to know.
Yep. That heal has saved me in the jungle more times than i can count.
Eh. Kass's shield rarely helps at all.
is annie a tank due to her e?
Tanky=\=tank.
Theres no bigger diver than nautilus, what party am i missing that he's not mentioned?
He's not a diver, he's a tank, who happens to engage.

WOOOOOSH

That's the joke going over your head.
Oh, ha!

I think the main reason is that they'd rather not have a Diver who has massive teamfight potential. It's meant to be a Assassination, and whichever team which picks Wukong can force the enemy team to group to deal with a grouped push, which gives Wukong that Knock you up, if you dare try to attack feel.

>I think the main reason is that they'd rather not have a Diver who has massive teamfight potential. It's meant to be a Assassination

{{champion:85}}
Wait you can push in this mode?
https://i.imgflip.com/1jdmto.jpg
its becaus of his ulty, a rioter commented in the main blood moon post about how they were trying to stay away from aoe hard cc, the only reason ekko is in is because his hard cc is well telegraphed

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=k1z8abnr,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-02-10T00:07:11.176+0000)
>
> its becaus of his ulty, a rioter commented in the main blood moon post about how they were trying to stay away from aoe hard cc, the only reason ekko is in is because his hard cc is well telegraphed

Is that why Kennen is there with his ultimate EVERY SINGLE TIME YOU TRY TO FIGHT HIM L?
well kennen camille diana fizz all have aoe cc.
Kennen?
pretty sure he only got in cuz he had a BM skin
Because if {{champion:62}} goes in, he can W out if he needs to. {{champion:80}} and {{champion:5}} don't have any escape, so when they go in, they stay in.

{{champion:7}} {{champion:164}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:157}} 

All have better escapes
Because Riot can call Teemo an assassin and no one will say otherwise. They're big brother.
but Wukong is even on the "Divers Class" list they made lol

They explained why Nocturne was not chosen, and it was for a good reason.

Mind elaborating?

Nocturne is as much of an assassin as Rengar and Kha'zix. Is it because he doesn't have stealth nor invulnerability?

> [{quoted}](name=GankedFromBehind,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=k1z8abnr,comment-id=000f00000000,timestamp=2017-02-10T02:53:40.909+0000)
>
> Mind elaborating?
> 
> Nocturne is as much of an assassin as Rengar and Kha'zix. Is it because he doesn't have stealth nor invulnerability?

Wukong and Nocturne are both Fighter hybrids. How Camille got picked, I don't know.
IMO Wukong and Nocturne should be in that game mode.

Much like Nocturne, Wukong would be too damn impactful. He removes the enemy's agency to do anything because he can break off in stealth and then jump out of nowhere to one shot you.

Also his ultimate would be really freaking hard to deal with if you're a squishy assassin, especially when it's not gated by its usual cooldown or Wukong's mana costs.
